```python
# Tool: github_sync_debate
@mcp_tool
def github_sync_debate(
    thread_id: str,
    discussion_number: int | None = None,
    repo: str = "elevanaltd/HestAI-MCP"
) -> dict:
    """
    Sync debate-hall state to GitHub Discussion.
    If discussion_number is None, creates new Discussion.
    Posts all unsynced turns as comments.
    Returns: {discussion_url, synced_turns, status}
    """

# Tool: ratify_rfc
@mcp_tool  
def ratify_rfc(
    thread_id: str,
    adr_number: int,
    title: str
) -> dict:
    """
    1. Extract Door synthesis from debate
    2. Generate ADR file from template
    3. Update rfc-discussion-index.md
    4. Lock GitHub Discussion
    5. Create PR with changes
    Returns: {adr_path, pr_url, discussion_locked}
    """
```
